beer.name: Out Of Bounds Stout
beer.description: This big, roasty stout takes flavor to the extreme. We aren't afraid to use plenty of rich roasted barley and a mountain of hops to give this full-bodied stout that little extra something you've been looking for in a beer.
beer.grains: Two-row barley, roasted barley, black, caramel 120L
Two-row barley, roasted barley, black, caramel 120L
